rationales.self_direction: He chooses to work on his own terms and values the quiet autonomy after everyone leaves over administrative demands.
rationales.achievement: Staying late to finish grading instead of deferring it shows performance-focused follow-through despite fatigue.

rationales.self_direction: He resists the scripted district package and defends the elective he built himself, emphasizing independent judgment.
rationales.conformity: He openly objects in a room where others comply, signaling willingness to disrupt group alignment norms.

rationales.self_direction: He explicitly champions giving students room to pursue meaningful topics rather than following rigid scripts.
rationales.benevolence: He invests in Daniela's growth by affirming her work and writing an unsolicited recommendation letter.

rationales.self_direction: He frames the decision around staying true to the teaching model he authored rather than institutional strategy.
rationales.power: He views the liaison title as a compromise and resists taking status or influence at the cost of his principles.

rationales.self_direction: He definitively declines the liaison role to preserve autonomy over how he works.
rationales.hedonism: He intentionally spends the weekend in restorative, enjoyable activities like woodworking and the farmers market.
rationales.benevolence: He makes a handmade gift for a neighbor and supports a student with full marks and a recommendation letter.
